ygData.subject: Vial Skins & Pelts
ygData.msgSnippet: I have tried various things with Pottery and found some work and some don t.   I ve tried to keep track, but now with SoV, there are many new kinds.  I wasn t
ygData.messageBody:
I have tried various things with Pottery and found some work and some
don't. I've tried to keep track, but now with SoV, there are many
new kinds. I wasn't sure if the Vial's used as a catch-all for Named
Pelts has been updated.

CrossPosted from my posting on www.eqtraders.com:

Found on a vendor in Erudian:
Kobold Hide
Sabertoothtiger Hide
Sabertoothtiger Mane

I may try them with pottery viles just to confirm.
If they are part of a quest, also post to the Quest messages.

I know that the www.thesafehouse.org rouges are very interested in
throwing mud for their toxins and even dyes now (Med Jar).

I have an old list (11/23/99) that was xPosted here.

Dicey found a list on Allakhazam's site:
http://everquest.allakhazam.com/Skills/Pottery.htm

Poison Vials Use Animal Skins per the list below
Verified animal skins for Poison Vials:

low quality bear skin
low/med/high cat pelt
polar bear skin
puma skin
white wolf skin
grizzly bear skin
zombie skin (very useful - stackable)
blackburrow gnoll skin
mist wolf
black wolf skin

The following will not work:
Anything ruined
deathfist pawn scalp
giant rat pelt
shadow wolf pelt {Used by tailors for Necro Shadowsilks}
giant snake skin
silk swatch
shark skin
Kerra Guard Skin

EverFaithful
Cleric Taven
